name: Not Quite Alone
description:
A short rogue-like dungeon crawler through a haunted house. Avoid ghosts and defeat the 2 unique bosses while exploring procedurally generated maps!

This game was made in a week for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2.

Keyboard Controls:

Movement: WASD

Shoot: Arrow Keys

Credits:

Programmer and Project Lead: Bryan Huke

Game Designer and SFX: Jarrett Workman

Pixel Artist: GrandCrossAge

Music Composer: Sam Curtice

Concept Artist: HuntArtist
